wordGroup: ship owner 船东；船主；船舶所有人
house owner 业主；房屋所有人
majority owner 多数份数拥有人
part owner n. （船舶的）共有人
registered owner 登记拥有人；注册业主
owner of the project 项目的所有者

sentences.en: The dog looked mournfully after its owner.
sentences.cn: 狗悲伤地目送主人离去。

sentences.en: The stolen car was returned to its rightful owner.
sentences.cn: 被盗的汽车还给了其合法的主人。

sentences.en: The owner couldn't be bothered to brand the cattle.
sentences.cn: 主人懒得给这牛打上烙印。
